headline.main: PSA Targets Opel Turnaround as GM Exits Europe
headline.print_headline: PSA Targets Opel Turnaround as GM Exits Europe

lead_paragraph: France's PSA Group plans to buy Opel from General Motors in a deal valuing the business at 2.2 billion euros ($2.3 billion), creating a new European car company to challenge market leader Volkswagen.
snippet: France's PSA Group plans to buy Opel from General Motors in a deal valuing the business at 2.2 billion euros ($2.3 billion), creating a new European car company to challenge market leader Volkswagen....
